name: venn.js
author: Ben Frederickson <ben@benfrederickson.com> (http:/www.benfrederickson.com)
description: Area Proportional Venn and Euler Diagrams

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -u venn -n venn -o build/venn.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/venn.js -c -m -o build/venn.min.js && rm -f build/venn.zip && zip -j build/venn.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/venn.js build/venn.min.js
